title.narrative: Conservation of the Late 19th-Century Wooden Church in Batete

description.narrative: The wooden church in Batete is one of the most important cultural heritage sites in Equatorial Guinea. This project involves a condition assessment and the development of a conservation plan to address physical and structural deterioration.
